cleaned_text: Which Healing Therapy Will Bring You Comfort? [Quiz] Turn to these healing treatments for your mind, body, and soul. Jun 30, 2021 Healing therapies enhance and facilitate the health of your mind, body, and spirit. The practices complement [wellness](/articles/5-ancient-approaches-to-wellness-that-still-apply-today) rituals and help release emotions and tension stored in your body to ease physical pain. When you tune into your body, you can discover the ideal remedy to bring emotion, physical, and spiritual relief. Take this quiz to find out which [healing](/articles/7-affordable-healing-retreats-to-recharge-your-soul) therapy will bring you comfort and peace of mind.
